title: Explore Miami
abstract: Discover the vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and thrilling activities that Miami has to offer. From the nightlife to the art districts, there's something for everyone in this iconic city. Enjoy a blend of urban charm and natural beauty as you explore Miami's top attractions.

services.title: Luxury Stays
services.intro: Experience Miami's finest accommodations, from five-star resorts to boutique hotels.
list: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne: An oceanfront luxury resort offering a secluded island experience.
W South Beach: A modern, chic hotel with beachfront access and world-class dining.
The Palms Hotel & Spa: Eco-friendly beach resort surrounded by tropical gardens.

services.title: Outdoor Adventures
services.intro: Explore Miami's natural beauty with a variety of outdoor activities and tours.
list: Everglades National Park: Airboat tours through the wetlands to spot wildlife.
Paddleboarding in Biscayne Bay: A serene way to experience Miami's waters.
Jungle Island: Interactive experiences with exotic animals and thrilling shows.

services.title: Food & Cuisine
services.intro: Indulge in the diverse flavors of Miami, where Latin American cuisine meets global influences.
list: Coyo Taco: Fresh, authentic Mexican street food in a lively setting.
La Mar by Gast√≥n Acurio: Peruvian dishes with stunning views of Biscayne Bay.
The Salty Donut: Miami's favorite artisanal donut shop.

services.title: Art & Culture
services.intro: Immerse yourself in Miami's art and cultural scene, from museums to street murals.
list: Wynwood Walls: An outdoor museum showcasing colorful street art by global artists.
Perez Art Museum Miami: Contemporary art exhibitions and beautiful waterfront views.
The Bass: A contemporary art museum housed in an Art Deco building.

packages.title: Miami Art Deco Walking Tour
packages.description: Step back in time with a guided tour of Miami's famous Art Deco District in South Beach. Learn about the architectural history and cultural significance of this iconic neighborhood.

packages.title: Little Havana Cultural Experience
packages.description: Dive into the rich Cuban heritage of Miami with a cultural tour of Little Havana. Visit iconic landmarks, sample traditional Cuban food, and enjoy live music and dancing.

packages.title: South Beach Nightlife Tour
packages.description: Experience the vibrant nightlife of South Beach with VIP access to some of the hottest clubs and bars. Enjoy complimentary drinks and skip-the-line entry with this exclusive package.

packages.title: Sunset Cruise on Biscayne Bay
packages.description: Sail along Biscayne Bay at sunset for breathtaking views of the Miami skyline and surrounding islands. This relaxing cruise offers a perfect way to unwind and capture beautiful photos.

packages.title: Key Biscayne Eco Adventure
packages.description: Escape to Key Biscayne for a day of kayaking, snorkeling, and exploring the natural beauty of Miami's coastal ecosystems. Led by expert guides, this tour offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.

packages.title: Deep Sea Fishing Charter
packages.description: Join an expert crew for a deep sea fishing adventure off the coast of Miami. Whether you're a seasoned angler or a beginner, this package offers an exciting day on the water.
